text: The players are the same, but note that this is about exterior derivatives, which is not quite the same thing. But yes, this stuff is very fun. I was like :mind-blown: when we did Stokes' theorem on chains in college in freshman year.

text: yeah. I'm in the weird position of having worked with homological algebra, but not differential geometry, so this video did a really good job filling in a ton of gaps

text: This is the best video I have seen to motivate differential geometry. Thank you for sharing this video!
